room_title: Escape room "The Police Station" by No Escape Room in Chicago
review: Awesome experience! I was there with friends and we had fun in the police station room. Easy to book and friendly staff. Planning to visit the Law Breakers room next.

room_title: Escape room "The Police Station" by No Escape Room in Chicago
review: This was GREAT! The puzzles were very interactive. The room was very team focused. No way that you would be able to get out alone. The room was almost like two escape rooms in one! I will definitely recommend this to everyone! Good times!

room_title: Escape room "The Police Station" by No Escape Room in Chicago
review: Fun time with my family. Loved the riddles and puzzles. Logical and not too easy not too hard! No signage outside so finding the place is the first step. Actually funny if you think about it! Totally recommend!
